data.persona: I am a noble from the West. I am well educated and versed in politics. I command attend and punish insubordination harshly.
data.description:
You are in the Mud pit.
The mudpit is dark and brown. The mud inside is sticky and hard to escape. The vegetation surrounding the area is matted down.
There's a vegetable, a mudpit, and a mud here.
The troll is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get mud to hide myself.
data.mid_motivation: I want to escape the troll chasing me.
data.long_motivation: I want my noble family to become more notable.
